entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 8:09 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -19.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
